Themes: App Icons, Wallpapers

Brief: Themes: App Icons, Wallpapers is a creative app designed to bring a fresh and artistic touch to your mobile device. Offering over 1,000 live HD themes that include app icons, widgets, and backgrounds, it caters to a variety of aesthetics and preferences. Whether it's Valentine's Day, Halloween, Christmas, or any other occasion, this app has a theme to match your style and mood. Not to mention, an impressive collection of over 500 HD wallpapers to customize your device even further.

Core Features:

  • üé® Extensive Theme Library: Over 1,000 live HD themes compatible with many android devices.
  • üåå Wallpaper Wonderland: More than 500 HD wallpapers across diverse categories.
  • üîÑ Easy Customization: Set wallpapers with a single click and rearrange your home screen effortlessly.
  • üõ†Ô∏è Personalization Flexibility: Mix and match lock screen styles, widgets, app icons, and fonts.
  • üîã Battery-Friendly: Optimized for performance, without heavy battery consumption.

  • üëç Regular Updates: Weekly updates bring fresh, trendy launcher themes for the year.
  • üëç Custom Icon Packs: Personalize your device with an array of icons, including social media platforms.
  • üëç Lock Screen Variety: Offers a wide range of lock screen options for further customization.

  • üëé Advertisements: Possible inclusion of ads to support the free service.
  • üëé Limited to Android: Currently, the app is exclusive to android users.
